lemma nba_igbg_ahs: "nba_igbg A = \<lparr> g_V = UNIV, g_E = E_of_succ (\<lambda> p. CAST ((\<Union> a \<in> alphabet A. transition A a p ::: \<langle>S\<rangle> list_set_rel) ::: \<langle>S\<rangle> ahs_rel bhc)), g_V0 = initial A, igbg_num_acc = 1, igbg_acc = \<lambda> p. if accepting A p then {0} else {} \<rparr>"
